entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
